programme.title: HSBC Sevens World Series
programme.desc: Day three of the USA Sevens from Sam Boyd Stadium in Las Vegas. Fiji, South Africa, New Zealand and the United States have all qualified for the semi-finals of the Cup..(n)

programme.title: Rotterdam Tennis Final
programme.desc: Tomas Berdych faces Stanislas Wawrinka in the final of the ABN AMRO World Tennis Tournament in Rotterdam. Berdych beat Gilles Simon in the semi-finals while Wawrinka saw off Milos Raonic..(n)
